Module frogger
Package frogger.controller

Enum GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GameController>
      • frogger.controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GameController>
    public enum GameController
extends java.lang.Enum<GameController>

    GameController

    The GameController class is used to manage the process and status of game and reflect the game results to the view

    Note: this class is implemented as an Enum thus to be a singleton class.

    Main Functionality: 

                    GameController.INSTANCE.startGame();
                GameController.INSTANCE.endGame();
                GameController.INSTANCE.handleKeyEvent();
                GameController.INSTANCE.handleTouchEvent();
                GameController.INSTANCE.handleEndEvent();
                GameController.INSTANCE.handleButtonEvent();
                GameController.INSTANCE.handleScoreEvent();
                GameController.INSTANCE.handleLifeEvent();
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wenzheng Shan
    See Also:
    SceneSwitch, GameView, Map, Pane, Life, Score, ActAnimation, MusicPlayer, ScoreListWriter, ScoreBoardUpdater, ScoreBaseFactory, Timeline

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      INSTANCE
      The shared instance for global use for whole project

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane background
      The game playing Pane
      private int endCount
      The number of end position has reached for current game
      private java.lang.String gameLevel
      The gameLevel of current game
      private Life life
      The Life of current game
      private Map map
      The game playing Map
      private java.lang.String nickName
      The nickName of current game
      private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,Score> popupScoreList
      A temporary LinkedHashMap store the high score of each round.
      private Score score
      The Score of current game
      private javafx.animation.Timeline timeLine
      A Timeline that shows the remaining time of game

      This method is called when the remaining life is zero or the endCount is five.

      Called when the restart Button is clicked and restart the game

      • init

        public void init​(GameView gameView,
                 java.lang.String nickName,
                 java.lang.String gameLevel)

        Initializes the game properties based on the given GameView,nickName and gameLevel.

        Parameters:
        gameView - The current game playing GameView
        nickName - The nickName of current game
        gameLevel - The gameLevel of current game

      • startGame

        public void startGame()

        Starts the game

        This method start the MusicPlayer, ActAnimation and timeLine.

      • endGame

        public void endGame​(int status)

        Ends the game

        This method stop the MusicPlayer, ActAnimation and timeLine And if the life is used up or endCount equals to 5 then call handleGameEnd().

        Parameters:
        status - The status of ending game. 0 means end game by pressing button and 1 means end game by reach all the end position or lose all life and then call handleGameEnd().

      • musicStart

        public void musicStart()

        Start playing the music by calling MusicPlayer.playGameMusic()

      • musicStop

        public void musicStop()

        Stop playing the music by calling MusicPlayer.stopMusic()

      • animationStart

        private void animationStart()

        Start ActAnimation timer by calling ActAnimation.actStart()

      • animationStop

        private void animationStop()

        Stop ActAnimation timer by calling ActAnimation.actStop()

      • timeLineStart

        private void timeLineStart()

        Start timeLine by calling Animation.playFromStart()

      • timeLineStop

        private void timeLineStop()

        Stop timeLine by calling Timeline.stop()

      • handleKeyPressedEvent

        public void handleKeyPressedEvent​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)

        This method call Frog.moveKeyPressed(String) when player presses a key.

        This method is added into Scene in SceneSwitch and called when player presses a key.

        Parameters:
        event - Player pressed key event

      • handleKeyReleasedEvent

        public void handleKeyReleasedEvent​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)

        This method call Frog.moveKeyReleased(String) when player releases a key.

        This method is added into Scene in SceneSwitch and called when player releases a key.

        Parameters:
        event - Player pressed key event

      • handleLogTurtleTouched

        public void handleLogTurtleTouched​(MovableActor actor)

        This method is called by Turtle or Log when they touch Frog.

        This method calls MovableActor.move(double, double) to let frog move with input actor speed.

        Parameters:
        actor - The MovableActor who call this method

      • handleObstacleSnakeTouched

        public void handleObstacleSnakeTouched​(MovableActor actor)

        This method is called by Obstacle or Snake when they touch Frog.

        This method calls Frog.setDeathType(String) to set frog deathType to carDeath.

        Parameters:
        actor - The MovableActor who call this method

      • handlePoolChomperTouched

        public void handlePoolChomperTouched​(MovableActor actor)

        This method is called by WetTurtle or Frog when frog sunk into pool.

        This method calls Frog.setDeathType(String) to set frog deathType to waterDeath.

        Parameters:
        actor - The MovableActor who call this method

      • handleEndTouched

        public void handleEndTouched​(MovableActor actor)

        This method is called by Frog when frog enter into terminal point.

        This method will check whether the entered end position is activated. If is not activated, then handle score event and reset the property of frog

        Parameters:
        actor - The MovableActor who call this method

      • handleScoreChanged

        public void handleScoreChanged​(int points)

        This method handle the Score add or subtract based on the given input points and call ScoreBoardUpdater.updateScore(int, java.util.ArrayList) to update scoreBoard view in Map. This method also called handlePopupScoreListChanged(int) to update the current round score list.

        Parameters:
        points - The point will be added or subtracted in score

      • handleLifeLosed

        public void handleLifeLosed()

        This method handle the Life lose situation and remove the corresponding imageView in Map

        This method also check if Life.getRemainingLife() equals to 0, then call endGame(int)

      • handleHomeButtonPressed

        public void handleHomeButtonPressed()

        Called when the home Button is clicked and back to the start screen as well as endGame(int)

      • handleRestartButtonPressed

        public void handleRestartButtonPressed()

        Called when the restart Button is clicked and restart the game

      • handleInstructionButtonPressed

        public void handleInstructionButtonPressed()

        Called when the instruction Button is clicked and show the instruction screen

      • handleGameEnd

        public void handleGameEnd()

        This method is called when the remaining life is zero or the endCount is five.

        After calling this method, it write the Score and corresponding nickName into file by calling ScoreListWriter.writeInFile(String, Score, String) and call SceneSwitch.switchToScoreList(String, Score) to show the high score list to player. Moreover, this method also create an additional score points based on the gameLevel by calling ScoreBaseFactory.createScoreBase(String).

      • handlePopupScoreListChanged

        public void handlePopupScoreListChanged​(int points)

        This method update the current round popup socre list with given point and called by handleScoreChanged(int).

        Parameters:
        points - The changed point will be added or subtracted in popupScoreList
